div.head: 余血搶心
div.div: residual blood knocking on the heart

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: residual blood knocking on the heart

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with chan hou bai xue gong xin 產後敗血攻心 , rotten blood attacking the heart following delivery. Xin xiu ben cao 新修本草 Substance Entry tu pi mao 兔皮毛：主產難後衣不 出及余血搶心 , “It controls [conditions where] following delivery the placenta fails to appear, and residual blood knocks on the heart ”.
